analysis.description:
Crowdsale.hasBalance (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1014-1025) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- allocatedIndex[_beneficiary].length > 0 && _releaseDate == allocatedIndex[_beneficiary][allocated[_beneficiary][_releaseDate].index]

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1213-1243):
	External calls:
	- ! token.unlock() (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1222-1228)
	- totalTokenSupply = IToken(token).totalSupply() + allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1231-1232)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1235-1238)

TokenRetriever.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#248-270) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenInstance.transfer(msg.sender,tokenBalance) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#268)

PersonalCrowdsaleProxy.fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#402-403) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-target.contributeFor.value(msg.value)(owner) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#402-403)

CrowdsaleProxy.fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#477-480) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-target.contributeFor.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#478-480)

CrowdsaleProxy.contribute (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#487-493) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-target.contributeFor.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#490-493)

CrowdsaleProxy.contributeFor (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#502-509) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-target.contributeFor.value(msg.value)(_beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#506-508)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1213-1243):
	External calls:
	- ! token.unlock() (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1222-1228)
	- totalTokenSupply = IToken(token).totalSupply() + allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1231-1232)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocated (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1235-1238)
	- allocated (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1242-1243)
	- allocatedEth (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1242-1243)
	- allocatedIndex (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1235-1238)
	- allocatedIndex (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1242-1243)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_account' of Ownership.isOwner (/unique_chucks/26/0xc939a768bca271e0c69c2c530a8c20dc1cfb60be.sol#67-68) is not in mixedCase
